entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Resolve cyclic dependencies between Http.Results and Http.Extensions #41330
  • Generic host/kestrel known cases proper error handling #41328
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #41327
  • W3CLogging file rotation seems to be deleting files out of order #41326
    7.0-preview5
  • Blazor webassembly App: Cannot call unknown function mono_wasm_set_is_debugger_attached, make sure it is exported #41324
  • Profile Blazor WASM using Mono log profiler #41321
  • Caching StackExchangeRedis throws exception when using Twemproxy #41320
    7.0-preview5
  • Need report exception when model deserialize failed #41322
  • Update Microsoft.AspNetCore.ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer dependencies (Duende.IdentityServer) #41315
  • MultipartReader.ReadNextSectionAsync() causes error "Unexpected end of Stream" #41313

Closed

  • When sending MultipartFormDataContent from HttpClient, the MediaTypeHeaderValue.TryParse does not handle multipart boundary value enclosed with quotes correctly #41237
    7.0-preview5
  • UnauthorizedAccessException when building .net core 6.0 project on MacOS #41307
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, mapaction, mvc #41316
  • Blazor Wasm benchmarks not working #41302
  • Blazor Server events generate a lots of network traffic in Edge DevTools #41294
  • Delegated Authorisation Scheme causing Posted body to be null #41318
  • Razor Class Library isn't adding typescript output to static web assets #41279
  • ASP.NET Core *. StaticWebAssets.xml get unexpectedly deleted in the dependent project's output directory on build #35345
    Backlog
  • Blazor Server - many comments rendered in html output #41293
  • Client Certificate is discarded on TLS 1.3+IIS hosting #41162
  • Quarantine ConfigurationChangeStopsInProcess #40628
    Test failures

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow HttpSys zero-byte reads #41305 #41332
    area-runtime
  • Debug `dotnet restore` problems #41331
    area-infrastructure
  • Draft Surrogate argument list #41325
    area-runtime
  • Sync shared code from runtime #41317
    blocked, area-runtime
  • [release/2.1] Stick w/ `$(RepositoryCommit)` #41314
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x

Merged

  • Remove quotes from MultipartReader boundary #41308
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Fix Blazor Wasm benchmarks #41312
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview5
  • Unqurantine "Quarantine ConfigurationChangeStopsInProcess" #41304
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Unify initialization in DefaultHttpContextFactory #41333
    area-runtime
  • Helix Restore Issue Mitigation #41311
    area-infrastructure
  • Add MapGroup #41265
    area-web-frameworks
  • Allow sidebar to scroll for tall menus #41062
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Dispose httpclient in IIS tests #41283
    area-runtime
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Support all return types from handler in filters #41310
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Add linefeed terminator support #41269
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #41158
    blocked, area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
